projects.title: Impact Atmospheric System Plugin
projects.caption: Impact game engine plugin that simulates an atmospheric weather system, day/night cycles and seasonal cycles based on real-world date, time, and geographical coordinates.

projects.title: Fire Emblem: Chronicles of the Abyss
projects.caption: Browser-playable remake of Fire Emblem: Blazing Sword, a turn-based strategy role playing game for the Game Boy Advance, but with a different main character and plot twist.

projects.title: Super Mario World: Koopa Krisis
projects.caption: Browser-playable remake of the original Super Mario World platformer for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

projects.title: MathFlash
projects.caption: Web-based system designed to address existing problems regarding how mathematical content is displayed on the Internet using research topics in adaptive response time-based sequencing and perceptual learning.

projects.title: ImpactJS Enemy Editor
projects.caption: Tool for Impact developers to easily view and edit enemy files, quickly create new enemies, and to provide consistent code layout throughout files.

projects.title: ParallelText
projects.caption: Web application that enables users to read a text in two different languages in parallel.

projects.title: DocShare
projects.caption: Web-based text editing system with a revision control system built in. Enables users to create, modify, search, and share text documents.
